notes: Second generation flagship (2001-2003). GM G-body platform. V6 and V8 options. Final Oldsmobile flagship. Data sourced from Wikipedia Oldsmobile Aurora article, January 2025 revision.
Midsize sedan (1998-2002). GM W-body platform. Discontinued 2002. Data sourced from Wikipedia Oldsmobile Intrigue article, January 2025 revision.
Compact car (1999-2004). GM N-body platform. Final Oldsmobile model produced (April 29, 2004). Data sourced from Wikipedia Oldsmobile Alero article, January 2025 revision.
Third generation minivan (1997-2004). GM U-body platform. Shared with Pontiac Montana/Chevy Venture. Data sourced from Wikipedia Oldsmobile Silhouette article, January 2025 revision.
Second generation luxury SUV (1996-2001). Rebadged Chevy Blazer/GMC Jimmy. SmartTrak AWD. Data sourced from Wikipedia Oldsmobile Bravada article, January 2025 revision.
Third generation luxury SUV (2002-2004). Rebadged Chevy TrailBlazer/GMC Envoy on GMT360 platform. Final Oldsmobile SUV. Data sourced from Wikipedia Oldsmobile Bravada article, January 2025 revision.
